document.full_text: russia believes libyan leader muammar gaddafi has lost his legitimacy and moscow is prepared to mediate to facilitate his departure from power, state-run ria news agency quoted deputy foreign minister sergei ryabkov as saying on friday.
document.title: russia ready to mediate to help gaddafi leave: report
lines_and_colors: russia believes libyan leader muammar gaddafi has lost his legitimacy and moscow is prepared to mediate to facilitate his departure from power, state-run ria news agency quoted deputy foreign minister sergei ryabkov as saying on friday.
